comments.author: Mélanie
comments.content:
Aaah Japan... I've dreamed about this country for almost 2 years now... I wish I could be there travelling, instead of struggling at finding what to do with my life...
Anyway... I like the pictures, especially the one with the cherry tree... beautiful

comments.author: rheide
comments.content: Maybe if you were here, you would still be struggling to find what to do with your life ;) Thanks!

comments.author: bookjunkie
comments.content: I was supposed to go to Yokohama but the trip was cancelled.  Oh how your photos are transporting me there....lovely!!
